hero.title: Junior Backend Developer
hero.p1: Junior backend developer with a strong foundation in Java and SQL, focused on building clean, secure, and well-structured backend applications.
hero.p2: Comfortable working with Spring Boot and Spring Security, with hands-on experience designing REST APIs and working with relational databases.
hero.p3: Fluent in English and continuously learning, with basic training in Artificial Intelligence and a strong interest in backend architecture, data integrity, and best practices.

item_1.name: Marketplace
item_1.description: Backend-driven supermarket management system built with Spring Boot and a relational database, focused on product inventory, data persistence, and structured business logic.

item_2.name: Deal-Uni-Work
item_2.description: Backend API developed with Spring Boot to help graduates from Universities of different parts of the world connect with job opportunities more easily, focusing on data management and RESTful services.

item_3.name: LearnHub
item_3.description: Backend system built with Spring Boot and a relational database to manage course enrollments, users, and access control for an online learning platform.

item_4.name: JobBridge API
item_4.description: RESTful backend API built with Spring Boot to connect junior candidates with job opportunities, handling user roles, job postings, applications, and secure authentication.

item_5.name: SmartInventory API
item_5.description: Backend inventory management system developed with Spring Boot and a relational database, focused on product tracking, stock control, and structured business logic.

item_6.name: Eventify Backend
item_6.description: Backend system built with Spring Boot to manage events, reservations, and user participation, implementing capacity control and data persistence.

item_7.name: PayTrack API
item_7.description: Backend API developed with Spring Boot to manage payments, subscriptions, and transaction records, focusing on data integrity and service-oriented design.

item_8.name: SupportDesk Backend
item_8.description: Backend ticketing system built with Spring Boot to manage support requests, user roles, and ticket lifecycle through RESTful services.

item_1.description: Developing backend applications with Java and Spring Boot, focusing on REST APIs, data persistence, and clean architecture through hands-on projects.

item_2.description: Built multiple backend systems using Spring Boot and SQL, modeling real-world domains such as inventory management, job platforms, and course enrollment systems.

item_3.description: Strengthened core programming concepts in Java, object-oriented design, databases, and backend fundamentals through structured courses and practice.

item_4.description: Academic training in software development, databases, and system design, with a strong focus on backend development and problem-solving.
